home.about: Visit the official website of the Central Bank of Argentina (BCRA) for more information

reserves.title: International Reserves
reserves.description: Select a date range to see the evolution of international reserves (in million dollars). The BCRA has limited the consultation interval for variables in its API to one year, don't worry we will fix it soon.
reserves.notFound: No data found for the provided date range

exchangeRate.title: Exchange Rate
exchangeRate.description: Select a date range to see the evolution of the official exchange rate (in pesos per dollar). The BCRA has limited the consultation interval for variables in its API to one year, don't worry we will fix it soon.
exchangeRate.notFound: No data found for the provided date range

interestRates.title: Interest Rates
interestRates.description: Select a date range to see the evolution of the monetary policy rate. The BCRA has limited the consultation interval for variables in its API to one year, don't worry we will fix it soon.
interestRates.notFound: No data found for the provided date range

monetaryBase.title: Monetary Base
monetaryBase.description: Select a date range to see the evolution of the nominal monetary base (in million pesos). The BCRA has limited the consultation interval for variables in its API to one year, don't worry we will fix it soon.
monetaryBase.notFound: No data found for the provided date range

reverseRepos.title: Reverse Repos
reverseRepos.description: Select a date range to see the evolution of reverse repos for the BCRA (in million pesos). The BCRA has limited the consultation interval for variables in its API to one year, don't worry we will fix it soon.
graphLegends: Reverse Repos for the BCRA (in millions of pesos)
reverseRepos.notFound: No data found for the provided date range

inflation.title: Inflation
inflation.description: Select a date range to see the evolution of monthly and year-on-year inflation. The BCRA has limited the consultation interval for variables in its API to one year, don't worry we will fix it soon.
inflation.notFound: No data found for the provided date range

about.title: About
about.description: Web application developed by Imanol Gonz√°lez using the API of key variables from the Central Bank of the Argentine Republic (BCRA). If you have any suggestions or want to collaborate on the project, contact me through one of my social media channels or through my website.
about.apiText: API of key variables from the BCRA
